name: Chublands
description:
SUPER EARLY ACCESS!

A fat-themed 3D Platformer where you explore a luxurious resort, solving puzzles and collecting hexed snacks in pursuit of an evil witch!

Create your own custom fatty to adventure through each area of the facility, from the casino run by the succubi mafia to the waterpark claimed by the local sharkgirl gang, encountering new friends and enemies along the way!

This game will be heavily inspired by titles like Conker's Bad Fur Day and Super Mario Sunshine, along with some Warioland DNA for good measure.

Chublands is in a very early alpha state! More of a preview than anything else. If you'd like to support the game's further development, please consider visiting my Patreon! Patrons get early access to new builds, and exclusive updates and artwork!

Also consider joining our community on Discord!

Controls!

Movement
WASD / Left Analog
CameraMouse / Right Analog
JumpSpacebar / A
Ability
Left Shift / X
MenuEscape / Start

Debug Controls!

Reload Level
RChange Weight
Num 1, 2, 3, 4 / F1, F2, F3, F4
Debug Cam
F5
